thread.title: SVS Ultra Series Speaker Closeout Sale

author: Secrets
title: SVS Ultra Series Speaker Closeout Sale
text:
Colossal SVS Ultra Series Closeout Sale! Save up to $600 off pairs of the most acclaimed SVS speakers of all-time, plus bonus savings when purchasing a system. Score the best deals ever on reference Ultra Series loudspeakers before they’re gone forever.
An additional 5% savings is available when purchasing 5 or more products with promo code “System”. This includes subwoofers, Prime Series speakers, and items from the Outlet Store. All SVS speakers are timbre-matched and can be blended seamlessly in a home theater.
https://www.svsound.com/collections/ultra-series
Secrets Sponsor
Starts: Tuesday, 1/23 at 10am ET
Ultra Tower – Save $600/pair
Ultra Bookshelf – Save $400/pair
Ultra Center – Save $100
Ultra Surround – Save $400/pair
https://hometheaterhifi.com/reviews/speaker/bookshelf/svs-ultra-bookshelf-speakers-review/
Every design aspect of the SVS Ultra Series Speakers was scrutinized to achieve reference sound quality. Rendering a broad soundstage with incredible resolution, pristine clarity, and amazingly rich and articulated bass, Ultra Series speakers stand toe-to-toe with the best home theater HiFi speakers in the world.
Secrets Sponsor
